xwikidoc.content:
#set($pmode=$request.code) #if(!$pmode||($pmode!="add"&&$pmode!="modify")) #set($pmode="view") #end #set($op=$request.op) #set($classname="Affiliate.AffiliatePartnerClass") #if($op=="add") #set($obj=$doc.newObject($classname)) $obj.set("affiliateID",$request.affiliateID) $obj.set("partnerReferenceURL",$request.partnerReferenceURL) $obj.set("partnerName",$request.partnerName) $obj.set("email",$request.email) $obj.set("phone",$request.phone) $obj.set("groups",$request.groups) $doc.save() #end #set($is_first=true) #set($class=$xwiki.getDocument($classname).getxWikiClass()) #set($id_prop=$class.get("affiliateID")) #set($url_prop=$class.get("partnerReferenceURL")) #set($name_prop=$class.get("partnerName")) #set($email_prop=$class.get("email")) #set($phone_prop=$class.get("phone")) #set($groups_prop=$class.get("groups")) #set($page_title="Affilate Partner Management Page") #set($bar_title="Partner") 1 $msg.get("Affilate Partner Management Page")
#if($pmode=="add") #titlebar($bar_title "" "" "purple")
$id_prop.getPrettyName():
$url_prop.getPrettyName():
$name_prop.getPrettyName():
$email_prop.getPrettyName():
$phone_prop.getPrettyName():
$groups_prop.getPrettyName():
#elseif($pmode=="modify") ##end if($pmode=="add") #set($objs=$doc.getObjects($classname)) #foreach($obj in $objs)
#set($partnerName=$doc.displayView($name_prop,"",$obj)) #if($partnerName&&$partnerName=="") #set($obj_title=$bar_title+":  "+$doc.displayView($id_prop,"",$obj)) #else #set($obj_title=$bar_title+":  "+$partnerName) #end #set($del_url=$doc.getURL("objectremove","classname=${classname}&classid=${obj.number}&xredirect=${doc.getURL('view','code=modify')}")) #titlebar($obj_title "DEL" $del_url "purple")
## the first object's number maybe larger than 0
$id_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($id_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
$url_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($url_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
$name_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($name_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
$email_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($email_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
$phone_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($phone_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
$groups_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayEdit($groups_prop,"${classname}_${obj.number}_",$obj)
#set($is_first=false) #end
#else ##end elseif($pmode=="modify") ## view mode #set($objs=$doc.getObjects($classname)) #foreach($obj in $objs)
#set($partnerName=$doc.displayView($name_prop,"",$obj)) #if($partnerName&&$partnerName=="") #set($obj_title=$bar_title+":  "+$doc.displayView($id_prop,"",$obj)) #else #set($obj_title=$bar_title+":  "+$partnerName) #end #titlebar($obj_title "" "" "purple")
## the first object's number maybe larger than 0
$id_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($id_prop,"",$obj)
$url_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($url_prop,"",$obj)
$name_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($name_prop,"",$obj)
$email_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($email_prop,"",$obj)
$phone_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($phone_prop,"",$obj)
$groups_prop.getPrettyName():$doc.displayView($groups_prop,"",$obj)
#set($is_first=false) #end
#end
